summary: THE COMPUTER FOR OUR ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM ON OUR 2002 FORD WINDSTAR KEEPS GOING OUT, RENDERING OUR ANTILOCK BRAKES USELESS. THIS IS, OF COURSE, A SERIOUS SAFETY CONCERN. THIS PROBLEM HAS BEEN DIAGNOSED BY BOTH AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC AND A FORD SERVICE TECHNICIAN. ALTHOUGH THIS PROBLEM HAS BEEN FREQUENTLY REPORTED BY CONSUMERS AS BEING RELATED TO A FORD RECALL ON THE CRUISE CONTROL SYSTEM, AND THE FORD SERVICE TECHNICIAN EXPRESSED HIS OPINION THAT THE PROBLEM WAS RELATED TO THE RECALLED PROBLEM, FORD REFUSES TO REPLACE OR EVEN SUBSIDIZE THIS 850 DOLLAR PART. *TR
